title: Harvest Farm Block
description: Allows the villager to harvest nearby farms. Can only be used by Villagers.

max_seconds_before_search.title: Maximum Seconds Before Search
max_seconds_before_search.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the goal can take before searching for the first harvest block.

search_cooldown_max_seconds.title: Search Cooldown Maximum Seconds
search_cooldown_max_seconds.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the goal can take before searching again, after failing to find a block to harvest.

seconds_until_new_task.title: Seconds Until New Task
seconds_until_new_task.description: The amount of time in seconds that the goal will cooldown after a successful reap/sow, before it can start again.
